bwwExcerpt: "In this imported production from Shakespeare's Globe of London, deception is a source of radiant illumination for the audience, while the bewilderment of the characters onstage floods us with pure, tickling joy. I can't remember being so ridiculously happy for the entirety of aShakespeare performance since - let me think - August 2002...This "Twelfth Night" - which opened on Sunday in repertory with a vibrant and shivery "Richard III" that allows Mr. Rylance to show he's as brilliant in trouser
